name: HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES
description: This table contains the hospital transactions that were used in the creation of UB claim lines in Hospital Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the claim line in the claim print record.

columns.name: TX_PIECE
columns.description: The hospital transaction IDs used for the claim line.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: ID of the hospital transaction used in the creation of this claim line.

columns.name: CLAIM_LINE_NUM
columns.description: The ordinal position of the claim line. This can be different than the line number in the claim print record for claim print records that include summary lines.
